author: pauls
msg: Move the check for a security manager in Felix.init down one if statement to fix a security exception (FELIX-2589).

author: coheigea
msg: Updated project branding from XML Security -> Santuario.

author: not
msg: ARIES-417 The java.util.reflect.Proxy allows an empty array of interfaces, which is odd, so the filtering out of classes stuff now results in an object being returned instead of an IllegalArgumentException. So we need to explicitly look for this.

author: minfrin
msg: Remove the MOD_CACHE_REQUEST_REC hack, and pass the cache_request_rec
structure through mod_cache's function parameters in the usual way.

author: seelmann
msg: o added a project description and URL
o create a Maven site with directory skin
